H0.text: Whose alter ego is Sasha Fierce. Rihanna

H1.text: Whose alter ego is Sasha Fierce. Lady Gaga

H2.text: Whose alter ego is Sasha Fierce. Katy Perry

H3.text: Whose alter ego is Sasha Fierce. Beyonc

A4.text: Beyoncé created the alter ego Sasha Fierce to separate her stage persona from her personal attributes.

A5.text: Sasha Fierce was introduced with the release of Beyoncé's album I Am... Sasha Fierce in 2008.
